metadata.title: CVE-2023-5349 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory leak flaw was found in ruby-magick, an interface between Ruby andImageMagick. This issue can lead to a denial of service (DOS) by memoryexhaustion.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-5349` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-rmagick - 2.16.0-6ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-rmagick package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.16.0-6ubuntu0.1').
